item.description: Bojos per les matemàtiques, 16 oct. 2021 Guió de la sessió (conté activitats GoeGebra) Conjunt de punts formen triangle amb angle $\gamma_0$ Alexandra Elbakyan Interview Opinion

Disguised toric dynamical systems Code for Figure 6, generated with POV-Ray CC BY-SA 4.0 /*équations : x^2*y^2-4y^3-4x^3*z-27*z^2+18*x*y*z;# forme 2 */ #version 3.7; global_settings { assumed_gamma 1.0 } #include "colors.inc" #include "textures.inc" // pre-defined scene elements #include "shapes.inc" #include "glass.inc" #include "metals.inc" #include "woods.inc" #include "stones.inc" #declare r=0.02; // Cameras (to play with) #declare Cam1 = camera { // orthographic location <5,4,10> look_at <0,0,0> // right x*image_width/image_height // angle 78 rotate <90,0,90> } #declare Cam2 = camera { // orthographic location <15,3.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I was a postdoc at Department of Mathematical Sciences of the University of Copenhagen in the Mathematical Biology group mentored by Elisenda Feliu. Previously, I was a PhD student at Department de Matemàtiques of the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona under the supervision of Joaquim Roé. I also spent four months at TU Berlin in the framework of the Thematic Einstein Semester on Algebraic Geometry, funded by Sturmfels' Einstein foundation project “Nonlinear Algebra”.

item.title: Contact
